org.judal.storage.relational

Interface RelationalDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, DataSource, TableDataSource

    public interface RelationalDataSource
extends TableDataSource
    Basic interface for relational DataSource implementations
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

        Specified by:
        openJoinView in interface TableDataSource
